mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, t.* from (select i.*, s.state_name, c.city_name, m.manager_name from island i, state s, city c, manager m where i.state_no=s.no and i.city_no=c.no and m.manager_no=m.no order by i.island_name) t )
mapper.insert: insert into island values (island_seq.nextval, #{state_no}, #{city_no}, #{island_name}, #{manager_no} #{island_info, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{island_area, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{island_addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{island_inhabited, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{island_longitude, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update island set island_name=#{island_name}, island_info=#{island_info, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, island_area=#{island_addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, island_inhabited=#{island_inhabited, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, island_longitude=#{island_longitude, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where no=#{no}
